short_summary: This solicitation is for the provision of professional services for existing building commissioning (EBCx) of federal facilities. The services will be provided by a contractor and will involve one or more of the following activities: \
description: initial EBCx pre-screening,  Recommissioning(RCx), Ongoing Commissioning (OCx)
full_summary:
================
### Existing Building Commissioning Services

#### Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSOA)

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) invites suppliers to submit proposals for a Supply Arrangement (SA) for the provision of professional services for existing building commissioning (EBCx). The services will be used for federal facilities under the Greening Government Strategy and the Federal Sustainable Development Strategy.

#### Key Dates
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 31, 2025, at 15:00 (ET)
* **Publication Date**: October 26, 2022

#### Brief Description
The objective of this RFSOA is to establish a SA with pre-qualified suppliers to provide services for EBCx, Recommissioning (RCx), and Ongoing Commissioning (OCx). The services will include:

* Initial EBCx pre-screening to identify candidate buildings and select a suitable EBCx and GHG emission reduction approach.
* RCx mandate to optimize building performance and improve equipment and system operation.
* OCx to maintain and improve the performance of building equipment and systems.

#### Trade Agreements
The following trade agreements apply to this procurement:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Regions of Opportunity
The SA will be used to provide services in the following regions within Canada:

* National scope: Canada-wide
* Regional scope: Multiple regions, with a preference for one to six regions as specified in the proposal

#### Security Requirements
Security requirements will be applied to this procurement.

#### Contact Information
To obtain the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSOA) document, visit [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). For further information, contact:

* France Bolduc, Contracting Authority
* Email: [france.bolduc@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca](mailto:france.bolduc@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca)

#### Attachments
The RFSOA document and additional information are available on the Canada Buys website. Supplied The attachments link is explicitly highlighted.
